About

About Me:

» Brief Introducton
    I'm doing my master program at the Department of Computer Science, University of Arizona.
    I worked as a undergraduate research assistant at Data Storage and Application Lab, Wuhan National Laboratory Obto-electronics. From 2012 August to 2013 June.
    I'm interested in storage system design and development, applied machine learning.
